about_the_game:
Splash is an endless music festival in a neon city that never sleeps. Enormous crowds have gathered to watch you perform. Customize your avatar, choose your music pack, and step onto the main stage – you are the star!

Join the party

Add us to your Wishlist & join the Splash Playtest using the buttons above.

Experience all the features before they are officially released and join us on this incredible musical journey. Help us make Splash the best music game ever!

Play Together
With a vibrant online community, Splash is the perfect place to make friends, explore and experience the ultimate music festival.

Music & Performance


Experience the thrill of performing live to huge audiences within a gleaming neon world. Pick from an extensive range of genres and sound packs, and use our instrument to combine beats & loops to make amazing music in minutes. Release incredible special effects for the crowd to enjoy! If you’re in the audience, dance and vibe to the music and let the DJ know how much you loved their show!

Make your mark
Become the best artist in Splash! Master each pack and genre, and use special effects to make your performance really stand out. A great performance will help you unlock cool gear for your next set!

Player Customization


Express your personal style through an in-depth character customizer with thousands of combinations. Modify your character’s appearance, outfits, accessories and more! Progress through Splash to unlock more cosmetics and find your unique style!

Even more to come!


We are just getting started. We will be releasing new music packs, features, items, and events regularly. Follow Splash on social media to stay up to date with the latest news and updates!

name: Splash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
